title: Add WinUI support
body:
This PR supersedes https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/pull/1960.

**Description of Change**

Added views for Uno.WinUI https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/issues/1787

**Bugs Fixed**

**API Changes**

None

**Behavioral Changes**

None

**PR Checklist**

- [ ] Has tests (if omitted, state reason in description)
- [ ] Rebased on top of main at time of PR
- [ ] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [ ] Updated documentation

comments.author: TopperDEL
comments.body: When will that Nuget be available? Is this bound to a release of something else?

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: It should be coming out soon. I am just trying to get CI to build it as we type. Something just gave up and dies so now it runs out of disk space on CI... So it says. Hopefully this weekend or next week.

comments.author: TopperDEL
comments.body: That's nice! Thanks for the update! :)

comments.author: TopperDEL
comments.body: The package is there! Thank you! :)

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: Yeah, sorry about not updating this issue. I pushed the nuget and then started on some international flights.

comments.author: TopperDEL
comments.body:
All fine! I just polled nuget.org until I found the package and have been the first one to download it. 🤣
Thanks for your work and your update on this!
